mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId , content AS content , deadLine AS deadLine , defficult_cd AS defficultCd , defficult_Nm AS defficultNm , discord_use AS discordUse , dungeon_div_cd AS dungeonDiv , dungeon_div_nm AS dungeonDiv , gate_num AS geteNum , id AS id , party_url AS partyUrl , person_num AS personNum , pro_div_cd AS proDivCd , pro_div_nm AS proDivNm , reg_date AS regDate , start_date AS startDate , tag_div AS tagDiv , title AS title FROM PROJECTTEAMDB.raid_board_table
